name: Inspired By YouTube Series Season 1
description:
Inspired By is a YouTube series where Noble Phantom Games, consisting of Yugs and Matt, create prototypes from concepts in video games, movies, comic books, anime, and other media.

You can watch the series here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZPoMVI_rIPKTs7CSkGrvTzWJiUdASg8r
Follow us at Twitter: https://twitter.com/Noble_Phantom
Join our Discord server: https://discord.gg/d3WJ8k4
